short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Returns and displays the number of results for your Google search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google took away the number of results that would pop up after a search for no reason, and to complete silence.

This extension returns and displays the number of results for your Google search :)

I do not like a world in which good features for the end user are taken away, never to be seen again. Thankfully, it's a really easy fix.
